column5: Check out the article here... Hell I am gonna buy stock in the company and market them to fishermen!  http://seattlepi.nwsource.com/local/336716_shrimp25.html  Gerritt.
Reminds me of those green earthworms that were available  afew years ago, do you remember?
I bought green worms in Magnetawan this past summer....didn't help us catch more fish though...LOL.....  Interesting find G!

Well they may be on to something there???/huh....!!!! i was thinking of inventing a glow-in-the-dark scent spray !!!!!! for spraying on live bait & crankbaits!!!!!   oh ya,i really think it would work...can anyone loan me a few grand so i can get things rolling....ya i thought so..LOL..LOL..LOL
